fields.Title: Tribal Community Food Assessment in Idaho
fields.Outlet (if applicable): American Sociological Association, Public Policy Center at Boise State University
fields.Description/Abstract:
Partners:  Idaho Hunger Relief Taskforce
Katie Painter, Global Gardens
Gina Bressire, META
Residents, Duck Valley Reservation
Description of Partner:  Description of Partnership: I am working collaboratively with the Duck Valley Tribal Community and the Idaho Hunger Relief Taskforce, conducting research examining community food quality and concerns.  The research will be used to support policy changes and program development to improve food security for members of Duck Valley.  In these efforts, I am also working with Global Gardens and META, two organizations in Boise who are working with Duck Valley residents on food system issues.
Role:  Principal
